name: generator-skyward
description: Yeoman generator for scaffolding out a website
readme:
# Website generator [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/hideki-a/generator-skyward.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/hideki-a/generator-skyward)

- Make sure you have [yo](https://github.com/yeoman/yo) installed: `npm install -g yo`
- Install the generator: `npm install -g generator-skyward`
- Run: `yo skyward`
